stories.text:
I'm building a chat app, which will work exclusively on my website.

iOS does not allow push notifications. Android users I talk to have their web-notifications disabled globally due to spam.

What are my options? Ideally cheap/free
stories.title: Best way to notify my web users for new messages?
Dreams Are More Real Than Anyone Thought (2021)
GitHub suspends accounts of Russian devs at sanctioned companies

stories.text:
This question applies to things like writing a dissertation, writing a big piece of software, even running a startup, anything that's large enough that you start running into issues like:

- overwhelmed and don't know how or where to begin/continue

- lost the original spark/motivation/inspiration

- start to question everything

- confused about structure/form

- etc

I think I need most help with the momentum aspect, but any advice on tackling lengthy sizable projects are welcome!

PS: This is a repost of https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30964931
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you build and maintain momentum during lengthy projects?
Ask HN: What side projects are you working on over Easter?
